com.bergerkiller.bukkit.common.reflection

Interface FieldAccessor<T>

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    SafeDirectField, SafeField, TranslatorFieldAccessor

    public interface FieldAccessor<T>
    Defines the methods to access a certain field

    • Method Summary

      Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      T get(java.lang.Object instance)
      Gets the value of a field from an instance
      boolean isValid()
      Checks whether this Field accessor is in a valid state
      Only if this return true can this safe accessor be used without problems
      boolean set(java.lang.Object instance, T value)
      Sets the value of a field of an instance
      T transfer(java.lang.Object from, java.lang.Object to)
      Transfers the value of this field from one instance to another
      <K> TranslatorFieldAccessor<K> translate(ConverterPair<?,K> converterPair)
      Translates the get and set types using a converter pair

    • Method Detail

      • isValid

        boolean isValid()
        Checks whether this Field accessor is in a valid state
        Only if this return true can this safe accessor be used without problems
        Returns:
        True if this accessor is valid, False if not

      • get

        T get(java.lang.Object instance)
        Gets the value of a field from an instance
        Parameters:
        instance - to get from
        Returns:
        value of the field in the instance

      • set

        boolean set(java.lang.Object instance,
          T value)
        Sets the value of a field of an instance
        Parameters:
        instance - to set the field in
        value - to set to
        Returns:
        True if setting was successful, False if not

      • transfer

        T transfer(java.lang.Object from,
         java.lang.Object to)
        Transfers the value of this field from one instance to another
        Parameters:
        from - instance to copy from
        to - instance to copy to
        Returns:
        the old value in the to instance

      • translate

        <K> TranslatorFieldAccessor<K> translate(ConverterPair<?,K> converterPair)
        Translates the get and set types using a converter pair
        Parameters:
        converterPair - to use for the translation
        Returns:
        translated Field accessor
